with cte_post_like_count_tb as ( select post_id, count(post_id) as like_count from post_like_tb group by post_id ) select pt.post_id,

with cte_post_like_count_tb as ( select post_id, count(post_id) as like_count from post_like_tb group by post_id ) select pt.post_id,
